document_data.name: Jeffy
document_data.mainbody: '''Jeffy''' was a young boy living in [[Easthaven]] during the 11th century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The blond haired boy liked to wear dark tunics.
document_data.Personality: Jeffy was an rowdy young man who liked to mess with the animals of [[Icewind Dale]], like [[squirrel]]s.
document_data.Activities: Like many kids in the small community, Jeffy was interested in all the strangers coming in from the [[Frozenfar]].
document_data.Relationships: Jeffy was friends with a few other local children, like [[Chizelo]], [[Dillsandra]], and [[Ahmadora]].
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Jeffy and a few other children met a group of mercenaries who decided to head with [[Hrothgar]] on his expedition to [[Kuldahar]].
